name: Surma
title: Developer Programs Engineer
bio: Surma is an engineer working with the Chrome team. He likes to cut himself on the bleeding edge, goes full-stack every once in a while and prefers good code over functional one.

name: Tim Roes
title: Android- & Web-Developer
bio: Tim is an software developer for inovex in Karlsruhe. He mainly works in the fields of Android and web development and has a strong passion for usability and user experience. He also co-organized the GDG Karlsruhe.

name: Kim Hogeling
title: Web Developer
bio: Kim is a happy web developer working for @shopping24. He is crazy about performance - server side as well as client side. His job is his hobby, but in his spare time he tries out new technologies and he is currently building a vanilla JS game engine. Why? Because learning is fun!

name: Aygul Zagidullina
bio: Aygul is absolutely passionate about making our world a better place through technology and science. She is community manager of two Google Developer Groups (GDGs) in Germany and Russia, Google Top Contributor (TC) for Google+ and Gmail, active member of the global Women Techmakers (WTM) community, translator, quantum chemist, classically trained musician as well as MOOC and citizen science enthusiast. When not working or contributing to the community, she enjoys traveling, learning foreign languages, and listening to good music.

name: Hasan Hosgel
title: Android Developer
company: Kitchen Stories / AJNS New Media GmbH
bio: Hasan Hoşgel is a dedicated Android developer with more then ten years of professional programming. Since 2010 also developing Android applications. Continuous improvement of the architecture and also quality are his interest. He is also co-organizer of the “GDG Berlin Android”. Now working for Kitchen Stories and before that more then seven years for ImmobilienScout24.

name: André Tietz
title: Android Developer
bio: André is an (obsessed with) Android Developer working for mytaxi in Hamburg. He's interested in new technologies that simplify developers life and has been working on several apps in Dresden and Hamburg since Android Cupcake. Also he is a new Co-Organizer of the GDG Hamburg Android.

name: Martin Liersch
title: Freelance Android Developer
bio: I'm a passionate Android developer since I got my first Android device (Motorola Milestone). I have several apps in the Play Store, some with < 1 million downloads. I'm also a co-organizer of GDG Bodensee and a frequent speaker at Android events all over Europe.

name: Moath Qasim
title: Software Engineer
bio: I am a software engineer who works with the backend team at LOVOO GmbH, I am always eager to learn new stuff specially in topics related to Computer Science, being an engineer doesn't necessarily means I am only committed to technical topics, I like to dive in some business aspects and entrepreneurship values.

name: Maike Krüger
title: Mobile Test Engineer
bio: Having started with Android development at Kupferwerk, Maike decided to shift into an area of mobile development which is often underestimated and disregarded: Automated Mobile Testing. High quality apps as well as great usability and user experience now are the focus of her attention. She also is the co-organizer of the 'GDG Regensburg'.

name: Manuela Pfeifer Anastacio
title: Strategic Partner Manager for Mobile Apps
bio: Manuela is a Strategic Partner Manager for Mobile Apps at Google, with more than 9 years of online advertising experience. In her current job she is partnering closely with german speaking startups, helping them build a successful app business. She also manages a global research panel of mobile app developer at Google.

name: Jens Kühlers
title: Cloud Platform Sales Engineer
bio: Jens is a solutions engineer for Google's Cloud Platform, helping customers and prospects finding the products and systems which fulfill their needs and allow them scale efficiently. Jens has 8 ​years of experience working in Google. He started as a Network Engineer working on Google's global production infrastructure and spent 2 years on Infrastructure projects in Emerging Markets at Google Ghana. Before working for Google, Jens worked in technical teams at the United Nations and a local ISP in Germany

name: Martin Reinhardt
title: IT Architect
bio:
I'm working as IT Architect and enjoy playing with new technologies. I'm addicted to TDD and Continous Delivery ;)

In my free time I like to meet new people, my friends and also doing some sports and sailing.
